      消防预案流程部署（只需执行一次即可，如果执行多次，则使用最新版本）

      com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject MonitoringTemperature​()
      消防预案演示 说明：每次节点任务完成时，会发送消息到mq队列，消息格式为：{"val":[{"node":"开启声光报警","status":"完成"},{"node":"调用摄像头","status":"完成"},{"node":"值班人员确认","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开风机","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开风阀","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开百叶","status":"完成"},{"node":"启动干粉灭火","status":"完成"},{"node":"通知相关单位","status":"完成"}],"end":true,"key":"消防预案执行流程"} end字段：false代表流程为结束，true代表流程结束

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • deploy

        @RequestMapping(value="fireplans/deploy",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject deploy​()
        消防预案流程部署（只需执行一次即可，如果执行多次，则使用最新版本）
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}

        @RequestMapping(value="fireplans/demo",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject MonitoringTemperature​()
                                                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        消防预案演示 说明：每次节点任务完成时，会发送消息到mq队列，消息格式为：{"val":[{"node":"开启声光报警","status":"完成"},{"node":"调用摄像头","status":"完成"},{"node":"值班人员确认","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开风机","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开风阀","status":"完成"},{"node":"打开百叶","status":"完成"},{"node":"启动干粉灭火","status":"完成"},{"node":"通知相关单位","status":"完成"}],"end":true,"key":"消防预案执行流程"} end字段：false代表流程为结束，true代表流程结束
        返回:

      • getHisProInstDataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="plans/his-proc-inst/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject getHisProInstDataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                             com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.em.PlanPageVo vo)
        应急预案流程记录管理分页查询
        参数:
        ProcessInstanceId - 流程实例id（搜索条件）
        processKey - 流程定义key(必须)
        startTime - 时间戳
        endTime - 时间戳
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"pageNum":1,"pageSize":3,"totalPage":1,"totalCount":1,"list":[{"id":"5","processInstanceId":"5","processDefinitionId":"FirePlanProcess:1:4","processDefinitionKey":null,"processDefinitionName":null,"processDefinitionVersion":null,"deploymentId":null,"startTime":1533870537321,"endTime":null,"durationInMillis":null,"deleteReason":null,"endActivityId":null,"businessKey":null,"startUserId":null,"startActivityId":"startevent1","superProcessInstanceId":null,"tenantId":"","name":null,"localizedName":null,"description":null,"localizedDescription":null,"queryVariables":null,"processVariables":{},"persistentState":{"processDefinitionId":"FirePlanProcess:1:4","durationInMillis":null,"endStateName":null,"deploymentId":null,"businessKey":null,"name":null,"processDefinitionName":null,"endTime":null,"deleteReason":null,"processDefinitionVersion":null,"superProcessInstanceId":null,"processDefinitionKey":null}}]}}
